Entries.FC.OffendPhoebe: pause 100/speak FC.Phoebe "I should pop you in the mouth for that one.$3#$b#But...I mean, you are right though. But damn, I don't want you to be.$2"/pause 100/speak FC.Phoebe "Just give me time alright, I'll tell her.$2"/pause 100/speak Rosa "Please, both of you calm down...The situation is stressfull already without the bickering and threats.$2#$b#Espeacially threats, Phoebe you can't just do that.$3"/pause 200/emote FC.Phoebe 12/textabovehead FC.Phoebe "Oh, whatever...I'm outta of here.$3"/move FC.Phoebe 0 2 3/move FC.Phoebe -3 0 2 true/viewport move 1 -1 6000000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship FC.Phoebe -10/end
